nodes.text: Tatrang I was a hot rock planet with no moons that was located within the Tatrang system, a part of the Tammuz sector in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The planet occupied the closest orbit to its star, the red giant Tatrang. Tatrang I was lifeless and was considered commercially worthless.

Tatrang I was first mentioned in the 1992 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Two, which was written by John Terra for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tatrang system, and therefore the planet, in grid square U-14.
